item.title: Co-worker: Gilgo murders suspect unnerved her by tracking her down on a cruise
item.description: Exclusive details about the NYC architect accused of being the Long Island serial killer, his life and how he may have been hiding in plain sight for ...

item.title: Stocks gyrate as nervous investors eye intensifying trade war
item.description: The S&P 500 is approaching a bear market, with stocks down almost 20% from their mid-February peak, as trade war intensifies.

item.title: China hikes tariffs on U.S. goods to 84%, as EU also hits back
item.description: China said it will hike its levies on U.S. imports to 84% after President Trump hit Chinese goods with 104% tariff

item.title: Virginia shooting kills 3 and wounds 3 others; suspects in custody
item.description: Four people were charged in connection with a shooting that killed three people and wounded three others in Virginia, authorities said.
